item.title: Integrate git with the Hugo build process
item.description: Working Hard is not Smart I believe most Hugo authors use Git as source control. This is a smart move and makes recovering from mistakes a breeze. in the case of a remote repository Git also provides a rudimentary back-up solution. Why not take this a bit further and automate some of the configurable parameters of Hugo, relieving you from the task of updating the same item (the last modification date of a post) over and over?
